alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:52PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Runoff from recent heavy rain is forecast to send the Wabash River at New Harmony into flood Sunday morning. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning and continue rising to 18.9 feet Sunday, March 12. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
